LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A large snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked - it's better to stay away from these creatures.
LanguageData.Cobra_Leather.label: cobraskin
LanguageData.Cobra_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a cobra.
LanguageData.Cobra_Meat.label: cobraflesh
LanguageData.Cobra_Corpse.label: cobra corpse
LanguageData.Monkey.label: ape
LanguageData.Monkey.description: This monkey can use its curly tail to grab on to branches, leaving its hands free to do other things.
LanguageData.Monkey_Leather.label: monkeyhide
LanguageData.Monkey_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a monkey.
LanguageData.Monkey_Meat.label: monkey meat
LanguageData.Monkey_Corpse.label: monkey corpse
LanguageData.Chinchilla.label: chinchilla
LanguageData.Chinchilla.description: A small but quick rodent famous for its exceptionally soft fur.
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Leather.label: chinchilla fur
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a chinchilla.
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Meat.label: chinchilla meat
LanguageData.Chinchilla_Corpse.label: chinchilla corpse
LanguageData.Boomalope.label: boomalope
LanguageData.Boomalope.description: Engineered for chemicals production, the boomalope grows a large sac of volatile chemicals on its back. Though it is weak and fragile for its size, other animals have learned to avoid it because of the huge explosion it produces when it dies.
LanguageData.Boomalope_Leather.label: boomalope leather
LanguageData.Boomalope_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a boomalope.
LanguageData.Boomalope_Meat.label: boomalope meat
LanguageData.Boomalope_Corpse.label: boomalope corpse
LanguageData.Capybara.label: capybara
LanguageData.Capybara.description: The largest natural rodent, the capybara is well-adapted for steaming jungle.
LanguageData.Capybara_Leather.label: capybaraskin
LanguageData.Capybara_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a capybara.
LanguageData.Capybara_Meat.label: capybara meat
LanguageData.Capybara_Corpse.label: capybara corpse
LanguageData.Cougar.label: cougar
LanguageData.Cougar.description: One of the most dangerous big cats, cougars are solitary hunters with long, sharp teeth and claws. They stalk prey from hidden positions before pouncing.\n\nWhile humans are not their normal diet, they won't turn down a meal of vulnerable human meat.
LanguageData.Cougar_Leather.label: cougarskin
LanguageData.Cougar_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a cougar.
LanguageData.Cougar_Meat.label: cougar meat
LanguageData.Cougar_Corpse.label: cougar corpse
